title: FO-05: Discovery Agent
description:
Create FO-05 discovery agent with sentence fragment generation

## Context

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-25-fo-05/2026-01-25-fo-05-spec.md`

**Key files for this epic:**
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-04/agent.ts` - Reference agent to adapt
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-04/affirmation-agent.ts` - Affirmation agent to copy
- `app/fo-04/actions.ts` - Server actions pattern to follow

**Key differences from FO-04:**
- Agent receives both question AND answer (not just answer) for better context
- Agent generates varied reflective statements (avoid 'It sounds like...')
- Agent generates 13 sentence fragments (5 initial + 8 expanded) instead of chips
